name: Shield of Wings
text: You gain five burning wings that grant a fly speed equal to the number of wings × 10 (average maneuverability) for an initial fly speed of 50 feet. The first time in a round where you would take fire damage, a wing vanishes (reducing the fly speed granted) and you gain fire resistance 30 for the remainder of the round. When you are down to one wing (and a fly speed of 10 feet), your maneuverability drops to poor. When you lose your final wing, you become immune to fire damage for 1 additional minute, after which the effects of this spell end.
text_zh: 你获得五根燃烧之翼，它会赋予你翅膀数量 x 10尺（机动性普通）的飞行速度，起始为50尺的飞行速度。在获得该法术的效果后，当你将要首次承受火焰伤害时，一根翅膀会消失（同时降低飞行速度），而你会在该轮内获得30尺火焰抗力。当你仅剩下一根翅膀时（飞行速度为10尺），你的机动性会降低至不良（poor）。当你失去最后一根翅膀时，会在接下来的额外1分钟内变得免疫火焰伤害，本法术会在此之后结束。
